ai-thag8.3:1.1_0: When I first saw the Teacher
ai-thag8.3:1.2_0: the teacher fears nothing from any quarter.
ai-thag8.3:1.3_0: I was struck with a sense of urgency,
ai-thag8.3:2.1_0: Anyone who, having found such a Teacher,
ai-thag8.3:2.3_0: is like someone who, when Lucky Luck comes to them,
ai-thag8.3:2.4_0: would drive her away with their hands and feet.
ai-thag8.3:3.1_0: Then I left behind my children and wives,
ai-thag8.3:3.3_0: I had my hair and beard cut off,
ai-thag8.3:4.1_0: Endowed with the monastic training and livelihood,
ai-thag8.3:5.1_0: Then a wish occurred to me,
ai-thag8.3:5.3_0: I wouldn’t sit down, not even for a moment,
ai-thag8.3:5.4_0: not until the dart of craving is drawn out.
ai-thag8.3:8.1_0: At the end of the night,
ai-thag8.3:8.2_0: as the rising of the sun drew near,
ai-thag8.3:8.6_0: a senior monk who is senior ...
ai-thag8.3:8.7_0: The Book of the Eights is finished.
ai-thag8.3:9.0_0: Then they pass away from that host of gods
